__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: Jarbnets

pages.text: The jarbnet is a cosmetic storage block for $(l:tfc:mechanics/jarring)Jars$(), Candles, and Jugs. It can be opened and closed by clicking with an empty hand and $(item)$(k:key.sneak)$() pressed. If candles are inside, it can be lit to produce a small amount of light.
